events.name: Demand for EVs
events.wd_description: The demand for electric vehicles (EVs) has been increasing due to the requirement of clean energy and low running cost.
events.description: The demand for electric vehicles (EVs) has been increasing due to the requirement of clean energy and low running cost.

events.name: Subsidies from government
events.wd_description: The government is providing subsidies to users for purchasing electric vehicles.
events.description: The government is providing subsidies to users for purchasing electric vehicles.

events.name: Increased demand for batteries
events.wd_description: The increase in the adoption of EVs has led to a significant increase in the demand for batteries.
events.description: The increase in the adoption of EVs has led to a significant increase in the demand for batteries.

events.name: LIB recycling
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries (LIB) may be secondary recycled to be used for some other purposes or to recover some useful components from it.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries (LIB) may be secondary recycled to be used for some other purposes or to recover some useful components from it.

events.name: Government subsidies for LIB recycling
events.wd_description: The government is providing subsidies to the users for secondary recycling of LIB.
events.description: The government is providing subsidies to the users for secondary recycling of LIB.

events.name: Recycling and reuse
events.wd_description: Evaluating the challenges and opportunities for recycling and reusing electric vehicle batteries to enhance sustainability in India.
events.description: Evaluating the challenges and opportunities for recycling and reusing electric vehicle batteries to enhance sustainability in India.

events.name: Recycling processes
events.wd_description: Assessing the current recycling processes for electric vehicle batteries, including primary and secondary recycling methods.
events.description: Assessing the current recycling processes for electric vehicle batteries, including primary and secondary recycling methods.

events.name: Primary recycling of LIB
events.description: Reuse of the product without changing or altering it, such as repurposing LIB in solar or wind power stations to store electricity.

events.name: Secondary recycling of LIB
events.description: Mechanically altering the product to use it in another way or to recover useful components.
